portfolio.title: Travel-World
portfolio.description: Travel-World is a comprehensive platform that allows users to browse, book, and manage travel packages. It offers a user-friendly interface for both travelers and administrators. Built with HTML, CSS, React, Express.js, and MongoDB.

portfolio.title: Monopol 08
portfolio.description: Welcome to the Monopol project! Monopol is fully responsive real estate website built using HTML, CSS, and Angular.

portfolio.title: Tech Storm
portfolio.description: Personal Project, Website called Tech Storm - A platform where consumers can buy laptops. Build using HTML, CSS and React.
